# Fin Clips Protocol
[Edit this page](https://github.com/remygatins/GatinsLab/edit/main/field_finclips.qmd)

## Materials
- [ ] Screw top vials
- [ ] 95% ethanol
- [ ] 70% Ethanol
- [ ] DI Water
- [ ] Forceps
- [ ] Scissors

## Protocol
- 1. Fill screw top vials with 95% ethanol.
- 2. Prepare tubes, one with DI H2O and one with 70% ethanol. 
- 3. Sterilize tools by rinsing in DI water, then 70% ethanol, then wiping with Kimwipe. 
- 3. Cut ~1cm of fin and plsce in screw top vial.
- 4. Label vial and sterilize tools.
- 5. Store vials in -20 freezer, or -80 for long term storage.
